headline: Dave Ramsey Caller Says She Was Trying To 'Help' Her Husband Retire Early By Borrowing From His 401(k) To Buy And Flip Houses...But They Didn't Sell
summary: She had good intentionsâ€”just a bad plan. "I was just trying to help my husband retire early," a Boston woman told "The Ramsey Show," where Dave Ramsey's team took her through the wreckage of a failed real estate experiment. She took money out of her ...
